original: A Last Goodbye
translation: 最后的告别

original:
Friend,

I'd like to thank you for your aid in saving the Sorrows. We expected much greater loss of life, yet you managed to not only prevent that, but also allowed us to safely escape the White Legs' pursuit. You are truly a child of God, even though you might not share my faith. Know that the Sorrows will always remember you, as will my fellow Canaanites. Go in peace, my friend, and accept these humble gifts as tools to further God's work.

Daniel
translation:
朋友，

我想感谢你帮助拯救悲恸部落。我们本以为会有更大的伤亡，没想到你不仅阻止了伤亡，还让我们安全逃离了白腿的追击。你真的是上帝的孩子，尽管你可能和我有不同的信仰。要知道，悲恸部落将永远记住你，就像我的迦南同胞一样。平平安安的去吧，我的朋友，接受这些卑微的礼物，把它们作为推动上帝工作的工具。

- 丹尼尔

original: A Last Goodbye
translation: 最后的告别

original:
And the wild beasts of the islands shall cry in their desolate houses, and dragons in their pleasant palaces; and her time is near to come, and her days shall not be prolonged; for I will destroy her speedily; yea, for I will be merciful unto my people, but the wicked shall perish.

I thank you for your help in eradicating the enemies of Zion. You delivered God's wrath to those unworthy of his mercy. Zion will always remember you and if the need be, unleash its wrath on those that may wish to harm you.

Consider the contents of this crate our token of friendship. May these weapons and clothes serve you in your journey ahead; and may God watch over you.

Graham
translation:
豺狼必在他宫中呼号。野狗必在他华美殿内吼叫。巴比伦受罚的时候临近，他的日子，必不长久。为因我必速速毁灭她。因为我要怜恤我的百姓，恶人却要灭亡。

我感谢你帮助我们铲除了锡安的敌人，你将上帝的愤怒传递给了那些不值得他怜悯的人。锡安将永远记住你，如果有必要，向那些可能想伤害你的人释放它的愤怒。

把这个箱子当作我们友谊的象征吧，愿这些武器和衣服在你未来的旅程中为你服务。愿上帝保佑你。

- 格拉汉姆

original: Vending Machine Admin Override Code
translation: 自动售货机管理员覆盖代码

original: A Last Goodbye
translation: 最后的告别

original:
And the wild beasts of the islands shall cry in their desolate houses, and dragons in their pleasant palaces; and her time is near to come, and her days shall not be prolonged; for I will destroy her speedily; yea, for I will be merciful unto my people, but the wicked shall perish.

I thank you, friend, for your help in defending Zion from the defilers. Though we may not share the same faith or creed, I shall pray for you in your journey ahead. Know that you have made an ally today and that you will always be welcome in Zion.

Consider the contents of this crate our token of friendship. May these weapons and clothes serve you in your journey ahead; and may God watch over you.

Graham
translation:
豺狼必在他宫中呼号。野狗必在他华美殿内吼叫。巴比伦受罚的时候临近，他的日子，必不长久。为因我必速速毁灭她。因为我要怜恤我的百姓，恶人却要灭亡。

我感谢你，朋友，感谢你帮助保护锡安免受亵渎者的侵害。虽然我们可能没有相同的信仰或信条，但我将为你在未来的旅途中祈祷。要知道，今天你结交了一位盟友，锡安将永远欢迎你。

把这个箱子当作我们友谊的象征吧，愿这些武器和衣服在你未来的旅程中为你服务。愿上帝保佑你。

- 格拉汉姆

original: A Last Goodbye
translation: 最后的告别

original: I realize that the situation in Zion was tough. Forgive me if I was harsh to you; losing not only New Canaan, but also Zion and so many Sorrows weighs heavily on my mind. I will have to carry this cross with me, however, and do my best to guide the survivors into the future. Take these items away from this valley and use them as you see fit. They will only make it harder for us to find peace.\n\nDaniel
translation: 我知道锡安的情况很艰难，如果我对你太苛刻，请原谅我。不仅失去了新迦南，也失去了锡安，失去了那么多的悲恸族人，这让我很难过。然而，我将不得不背负着这个十字架，尽我最大的努力引导幸存者走向未来。把这些东西从这个山谷带走，你想怎么用就怎么用。他们只会让我们更难找到和平。\n\n- 丹尼尔

original: Vending Machine Code - "Automatic Rifle"
translation: 自动售货机代码 - “自动步枪”

original: This is a restricted dispenser code for use in the Vending Machines.
translation: 这是一串限量配货代码，可在自动售货机上使用。

translation: 自动售货机代码 - “马德雷山脉护甲”

translation: 这是一串限量配货代码，可在自动售货机上使用。

translation: 自动售货机代码 - “宇宙餐刀”

original: This is a restricted dispenser code for use in the Vending Machines.
translation: 这是一串限量配货代码，可在自动售货机上使用。

original: The Three Marys
translation: 三圣峰

original: Eastern Virgin
translation: 东维琴河

original: The Narrows
translation: 狭路

original: Sierra Madre Lobby
translation: 马德雷山脉赌场大厅

original: Brotherhood of Steel Bunker
translation: 钢铁兄弟会地堡

original: Mojave Wasteland
translation: 莫哈维废土

original: Villa
translation: 别墅区

original: Zion Canyon
translation: 锡安峡谷

original: Big MT
translation: 大山脉

original: {2D, Announcement}Big MT: I, Dr. Mobius, will soon control you - and all of Science!
translation: {2D, Announcement}大山脉：我，莫比乌斯博士，即将成为你的主宰——还有全科学的主宰！

original: {2D, Announcement, Taunting}Mighty Think Tank... still c-c-c-c-cowering in your Dome? Cower, you fools. {beat, slightly quieter}Cower.
translation: {2D, Announcement, Taunting}万能的思想体们…打算继续缩在穹顶里？那就缩着吧，你们这些蠢货。{beat, slightly quieter}缩着。

original: {2D, Announcement, Doesn't realize mic is on}Time to reward myself with a little breath-freshening Mentat. Mmmm.
translation: {2D, Announcement, Doesn't realize mic is on}是时候奖励自己一点曼他特了。仿佛重获新生。嗯嗯嗯。

original: {2D, Announcement}Try to leave your Dome, Think Tank, and you will be punished by the pincered might of my Robo-Scorpion army!
translation: {2D, Announcement}离开穹顶试试，思想体，我的机械蝎大军会用有力的钳子好好招待你们！

original: {2D, Announcement, Disgust}Think Tank... I wouldn't even use binary to describe my exponential hatred for you.
translation: {2D,Announcement, Disgust}思想体们…二进制都无法尽述我对你们的仇恨，指数级的仇恨。

original: {2D, Announcement}My aggression is increasing geometrically. Do you hear me, "Think" Tank?!
translation: {2D, Announcement}我的攻击性正以几何级数增长。听到了吗，思想体们？！

original: {2D, Announcement, To himself}Soon... all Science will be mine.
translation: {2D, Announcement, To himself}很快…科技将尽归我手。

original: {2D, Announcement}Oh, Klein - did I mention that my zone is FORBIDDEN to you? Ha ha ha ha ha! SO forbidden.
translation: {2D, Announcement}哦，克莱因，我说过禁止你来我的领地吗？哈哈哈哈哈！非常禁止。

original: {2D, Announcement}2 plus 2 equals... 4-Bidden, idiots of the Think Tank!
translation: {2D, Announcement}愚蠢的思想体们，2加2等于…4倍的禁止！

original: {2D, Announcement, Thinking}I hope I didn't leave my Giant Robo-Scorpion on. That thing eats power like no tomorrow.
translation: {2D, Announcement, Thinking}希望我没忘记关掉那只机械巨蟹。那家伙是个吃能量大户，像是吃了上顿就没下顿一样。

original: {2D, Announcement, Quiet}I'll just set this on repeat while I go relieve my tank... no one will know.
translation: {2D, Announcement, Quiet}在去休息的时候，我会设置成循环播放…没人会发现的。

original: {2D, Announcement}Rant! Rant! Rant! See how I abstract my rage, Think Tank? I hold you in such disdain I generalize my hatred for you!
translation: {2D, Announcement}怒吼！怒吼！怒吼！思想体们，看我是怎么形容愤怒的。对你们，我不屑一顾，根本懒得费口舌去仔细描述我的愤怒。

original: {2D, Announcement}Go, my mighty Robo-Scorpions. Crawl in search of intelligence. Then, {emph}sting said intelligence, yes, {emph}sting it.
translation: {2D, Announcement}上吧，我强大的机械蝎，给我找到智能体。然后，{emph}蛰他们，对，{emph}狠狠地蛰。

original: {2D, Announcement}My Robo-Scorpions will soon conquer the Crater. {Quieter, making excuses}It's just that this is a big place, so it's hard to conquer everything.
translation: {2D, Announcement}我的机械蝎即将征服整个环形坑。{Quieter, making excuses}不过这里确实挺大，完全攻克大概不容易。

original: {2D, Announcement}Klein... remember the time you forgot to carry the 2 and nearly blew up the {why-zero}Y-0 Research Center? {Klein did blow up the lab so now he's mocking}Oh, wait, you did! {beat}Or was that me?
translation: {2D, Announcement}克莱因…还记得那次你少进个2，结果差点把{why-zero}Y-0研究中心炸平的丑事吗？{Klein did blow up the lab so now he's mocking}哦，等等，就是你吧！{beat}难不成还能是我？

original: {2D, Announcement}Klein, as useless as the bottle of the same name... well, except as an example of an object that uselessly tries to fulfill its purpose.
translation: {2D, Announcement}克莱因，你就和克莱因瓶一样毫无用处…哦，除了用作反面教材，一个“试图实现目的却徒劳无功”的物事。

original: {2D Announcement}-The Cazador Preserve and the Nightstalker Splicing facilities are strangely quiet. TOO quiet.-
translation: {2D Announcement}-猎蜂保护区和夜行兽基因移接实验区还真是安静啊，静得都有点不寻常了。-

original: {2D Announcement}-X-8 and X-13 and X-2 are your DESTINATION, non-Lobotomite. Can you HEAR us?! You MUST hurry!-
translation: {2D Announcement}-X-8、X-13还有X-2是你的目的地，不是无脑人的无脑人。你能听见吗？！你必须快点！-

original: {2D Announcement}-What TERRORS does Big {Mountain}MT hold for the intrepid seeker?! {beat, quieter}Really. Does anyone know? I'm at a loss.-
translation: {2D Announcement}-大山脉 {Mountain}为无所畏惧的探险家准备了怎样的恐惧呢？！{beat, quieter}说真的，有人知道吗？我一直想知道。-

original: {2D Announcement}-BEWARE Dr. Mobius' army! His Robo-Scorpions crawl everywhere, in SEARCH of intelligence to devour and stupify!-
translation: {2D Announcement}-小心莫比乌斯博士的大军！他的机械巨蝎到处乱爬，捕食智慧生命，并向他们发射致愚光波！-

original: {2D Announcement}-Anyone who can understand these messages - YOU DO NOT BELONG HERE! We will FIND you!-
translation: {2D Announcement}-任何能听懂该信息的人，你不该来这儿！我们会找到你的！-

original: {2D Announcement}Slight chance of seed dispersal from Botanical Gardens predicted in the late evening.
translation: {2D Announcement}今天傍晚，植物园方向可能会吹来一团种子云。

original: {2D Announcement - There is no standing in the green zone}There is no standing on the green pipes. If you are standing on the green pipes, please get off them at once.
translation: {2D Announcement - There is no standing in the green zone}不要站在绿色管道上面。要是你站到了上面，请立即离开。

original: {2D Announcement}If you see Robo-Scorpions, do not attempt to fight them. They will shoot you with their robotic stingers, and then... possibly explode.
translation: {2D Announcement}要是碰到机械蝎，切勿尝试与其对抗。它们会用机械尾刺向你射击，然后…可能会爆炸。

original: {2D Announcement}Do not attempt to breach the Big MT force fields. Doing so could allow dangerous ideas and/or creatures having those ideas to escape.
translation: {2D Announcement}不要尝试破坏大山脉的力场。该举动不仅会放出危险的想法，还会放出带有这些想法的危险生物。

original: {2D Announcement}Are you out there, my little teddy bear Lobotomite? Dala misses you and the pitter-patter of your penis feet {emph}so much.
translation: {2D Announcement}我亲爱的小泰迪熊无脑人，你在哪里？达拉非常{emph}想你，还有你长着生殖器的脚落地时的啪踏踏声。

original: {2D Announcement}DR. MOBIUS, SURRENDER YOURSELF. YOU CANNOT WIN DESPITE THE FACT THAT THE ODDS ARE HEAVILY IN YOUR FAVOR.
translation: {2D Announcement}莫比乌斯博士，投降吧。尽管你已很有胜算，你仍然不可能获胜。

original: {2D Announcement}ATTENTION: THE BLUE GRASS SURROUNDING THE DOME ABSORBS ALL FERTILIZER, INCLUDING FECAL MATTER. THIS DOES NOT GIVE YOU LICENSE TO EXCRETE ON IT.
translation: {2D Announcement}注意：穹顶周边的蓝草能吸收所有肥料，包括排泄物。但这不意味着允许你在上面排泄。

original: {2D Announcement}X-12 IS CLOSED UNTIL FURTHER NOTICE. ON AN UNRELATED NOTE, WHOEVER CLOSED X-12, PLEASE REPORT TO THE DOME.
translation: {2D Announcement}X-12已被关闭，直至另行通知。说句题外话，不管是谁关闭了X-12，请立刻向穹顶报告。

original: {2D Announcement}PLEASE AVOID BOOM TOWN FOR THE FORESEEABLE FUTURE, UNTIL WEAPON TESTING IS RESOLVED.
translation: {2D Announcement}在可预见的未来里，请勿靠近“新兴城市”，直至武器试验结束。

original: {2D Announcement}ATTENTION: BIG MT. THIS IS AN URGENT MESSAGE. IF YOU HAPPEN TO SEE A GECKO... {loses train or thought as he starts trying the echo}ECKO. ECHO? ECH-O. ECHOOOO. ECHOOOO.
translation: {2D Announcement}注意：大山脉实验基地，这是一条紧急通知。如果你碰巧看到一只蜥蜴…{loses train or thought as he starts trying the echo}蜥蜴…回声？蜥蜴蜴蜴。蜥蜴蜴蜴蜴。蜴蜴蜴蜴。

original: {2D Announcement}THE REST OF YOU SHOULD TRY THIS INTERCOM THING. IT MAKES YOU SOUND LIKE SOME KIND OF... SKY-GOD!
translation: {2D Announcement}你们其他人也应该试试这个对讲机，它让你听起来有点像…天空之神！

original: {2D Announcement}ALL LOBOTOMITES, PLEASE STOP MILLING ABOUT. {beat}REALLY.
translation: {2D Announcement}所有的无脑人，请停止你们无目的乱转的行为，{beat}真的。

original: *{2D Announcement}Attention: Big MT. There is a 95% chance of clear skies interrupted with artillery fire.*
translation: *{2D Announcement}注意：大山脉研究中心。接下来晴转炸弹雨的概率是95%。*

original: *{2D Announcement}Attention: Lobotomites. Do not neglect to wash the Walking Eye!*
translation: *{2D Announcement}听好了，无脑人，别忘记去洗步行眼！*

original: *{2D Announcement}The Uncanny Valley research center has been canceled until further notice. As in, until someone notices it.*
translation: *{2D Announcement}恐怖谷理论研究中心目前已关闭，直至另行通知。就是说，呃，在有人收到通知之后。*

original: *{2D Announcement}We are reading increased levels of berserkity in Securitrons from the De-Construction Plant.*
translation: *{2D Announcement}检测到拆解工厂内电子保安的狂暴指数正迅速飙升。*

original: *{2D Announcement}Force fields can only be disrupted by a specific frequency. {Quieter, a little embarrassed, since he lost it}If anyone has found the frequency, last seen around X-8, let the Dome know at once.*
translation: *{2D Announcement}力场只能被某个特定频率破坏。{Quieter, a little embarrassed, since he lost it}如果谁找到那个，呃，丢在X-8附近的频率，请立刻到穹顶报告。*

original: *{2D Announcement}Do not approach the pylons. Pylons are the glowing things. Also, do not approach a fallen pylon. If you see a fallen pylon, call security.*
translation: *{2D Announcement}不要接近任何雷达塔。雷达塔就是会发光的东西。还有，不要接近任何倒下的塔。假如某个雷达塔倒下了，马上呼叫安保人员。*

original: Some of the flayed Hopeville soldiers looked like NCR... but fought beside others in Legion armor.
translation: 黎明镇上那些剥了皮的士兵看起来像是NCR...但是和他们并肩作战的人却身着军团的盔甲。

original: {Quieter}You see true. Not scavengers... it's what they wore {slight beat}before this all happened.{No sound file}
translation: {Quieter}你看到的是真的。不是拾荒者...这仅仅是他们在这一切发生之前{slight beat}的打扮而已。{No sound file}

original: [NCR] Those soldiers in Hopeville... were once NCR, I'm sure of it. Why were they with the Legion?
translation: [NCR]那些在黎明镇的士兵...曾经是NCR，我敢肯定。他们为什么和军团在一起？

original: Those Marked Men in Hopeville - some had strange masks and blades I'd never seen before.
translation: 那些黎明镇的烙印者...有些人戴着我从未见过的奇怪面具和刀刃。

original: {Quieter}You haven't seen enough of the Legion yet to see what they worship... what they hold on to, even after what happened to them.{No sound file}
translation: {Quieter}你还没见识过足够的军团去理解他们所崇拜的...以及他们所坚持的，即使在他们身上发生了那些事之后。{No sound file}

original: [Legion] Those Legionnaires in Hopeville wore Legion armor - and strange masks and blades.
translation: [军团]那些黎明镇里的军团士兵穿着军团盔甲...还有奇怪的面具和利刃。

original: [Legion] The dead in the silo, some were Legion Frumentarii, scouts. Assassins.
translation: [军团] 发射井里的尸体，有些是军团的特务、侦察兵、刺客。

original: Might have been. Once. To the Divide they came... in the Divide, they rest.{No sound file}
translation: 可能是吧。曾经，他们来到大裂谷...他们正在休眠，在大裂谷里。{No sound file}

original: [NCR] Those bodies in the silo were NCR soldiers... some special forces.
translation: [NCR] 那些躺在发射井里的尸体是NCR的士兵...某些特种部队。

original: Might have been. Once. To the Divide they came... in the Divide, they rest.{No sound file}
translation: 可能是吧。曾经，他们来到大裂谷...他们正在休眠，在大裂谷里。{No sound file}

original: [Legion] You've been to Denver? That's Legion territory.
translation: [军团] 你去过丹佛？那里是军团的地盘。

original: Mojave and the Divide aren't the only places I've walked.
translation: 莫哈维和大裂谷不是我唯一走过的地方。

original: I don't understand why you didn't kill me in Primm.
translation: 我不明白为什么你在普瑞姆没有杀了我。

original: {To himself}Promises to keep. 'Courier shall not kill Courier.' Always - let them live, spread the word.
translation: {To himself}信守承诺。“邮差不得杀死邮差。”永远 - 让他们活着，传播消息。

original: [Legion] You didn't kill me in Primm because you still thought I was Legion.
translation: [军团]你在普瑞姆没有杀我是因为你还以为我是军团的人。

original: {To himself}Promises to keep. 'Courier shall not kill Courier.' Always - let them live, spread the word.
translation: {To himself}信守承诺。“邮差不得杀死邮差。”永远 - 让他们活着，传播消息。

original: You might not believe in nations. I do.
translation: 你可能不相信有国家，我相信。

original: [SUCCEEDED] {Hesitant}Your actions have carried strength.
translation: [成功] {Hesitant}你的行动承载着力量。

original: [NCR] Even if you have no faith in the NCR, I do. My actions have proven it.
translation: [NCR]就算你不信任NCR，我信。我的行动已经证明了这一点。

original: [SUCCEEDED] {Hesitant}There is conviction in your words, enough to rival a Legate, perhaps Caesar. You believe what you say.
translation: [成功] {Hesitant}你的言语充满信念，足够媲美一位特使，也许凯撒也行。你相信自己说的话。

original: [Legion] The Legion is stronger than you know. If you would judge them, hear me first.
translation: [军团]军团的力量比你所知的更强大。如果你要审判他们，先听我说。

original: [SUCCEEDED] {Hesitant}Your actions have carried strength. More importantly, not for House, but for the families on the Strip.
translation: [成功] {Hesitant}你的行动承载着力量。更重要的是，不是为了豪斯，而是为了长街上的家族。

original: [Vegas] Even if you have no faith in Vegas, I do... and my actions have proven it.
translation: [维加斯]就算你不信任维加斯，我信...而我的行动已经证明了这一点。

original: [FAILED] Words are not enough to bear the weight of your flag - {disdain}if you follow anything at all.
translation: [失败]言语不足以承载你旗帜的重量 - {disdain}如果你追随着什么的话。

original: Speeches are things of NCR, words without strength. Your actions have shown nothing. {Beat}Your flag will burn. The Mojave will follow.
translation: 演讲是NCR的小伎俩，是没有力量的言语。你的行动没有证明任何事。 {Beat}你的旗帜将被烧毁，莫哈维紧随其后。

original: [NCR] You might not believe in nations. I do.
translation: [NCR]你可能不相信国家了。我信。

original: [FAILED] You came from the West, walked there. You carry its sickness East to the Legion - and do not believe their cause enough to honor them.
translation: [失败]你来自西方，行走在那里。你把它的弊病带给了东部的军团 - 却不相信他们的事业，不尊重他们。

original: What I give the Legion is a swifter death than the disease you bring. You have not the strength to bear a Legion standard.
translation: 我给予军团的将是比你带来的疾病更快的死亡，你没有力量来承受军团的旗帜。

original: [Legion] You might not believe in nations. I do.
translation: [军团]你可能不相信国家了。我信。

original: [FAILED] You serve Vegas ghosts, not the tribes Vegas devoured. House is not the people of Vegas - you have walked the Strip, yet have seen nothing.
translation: [失败]你为维加斯的幽灵服务，而不是被维加斯吞噬的部落。豪斯不是维加斯的人民 - 你走过长街，却什么也没看见。

original: Your carelessness for the paths you walk - it has destroyed the city you serve. {Beat}NCR will burn. Then the walls of Vegas will follow.
translation: 你对自己走过的路漫不经心 - 这已经摧毁了你服务的城市。{Beat}NCR会燃烧，然后维加斯的城墙也会随之倒塌。

original: [Vegas] You might not believe in nations. I do.
translation: [维加斯]你可能不相信国家了。我信。

original: If you speak for the two-headed Bear, I'll hear your words. Even if I will be the only one to hear them.
translation: 如果你要为双头熊说话，我会倾听你的言论。即使我是唯一的听众。

original: If you believe it should not die this day... then answer me why.
translation: 如果你认为它不应该在这一天死去...那告诉我原因。

original: {Suspicious}If you feel I do not know the Legion's strength - then I will listen.
translation: {Suspicious}如果你觉得我不了解军团的力量 - 那我也会听着。

original: If the ghosts of Vegas have come from behind their wall to speak for the West, I'll hear their words.
translation: 如果维加斯的幽灵们从围墙后走出来为西部说话，我会听到他们的话。

original: If you believe that Vegas does not deserve to die as the Bear does... then answer me why.
translation: 如果你认为维加斯不应该像熊一样死去...那就回答我为什么。

original: What do you mean?
translation: 你是什么意思？

original: {Agreeing}The Dam. That Old World Wall.
translation: {Agreeing}大坝，那面旧世界的墙。

original: [NCR] NCR would have needed this supply line open to reinforce the Mojave - and Hoover Dam.
translation: [NCR]NCR需要这条补给线开放来增援莫哈维...和胡佛大坝。

original: {DUPE}{Agreeing}The Dam. That Old World Wall.
translation: {DUPE}{Agreeing}大坝，那面旧世界的墙。

original: [Legion] The Legion would want to cut this road off if it had been a supply line to Hoover Dam.
translation: [军团]如果这条路是胡佛大坝的补给线那军团会想把它切断的。

original: {DUPE}{Agreeing}The Dam. That Old World Wall.
translation: {DUPE}{Agreeing}大坝，那面旧世界的墙。

original: [Legion] Killing NCR, cutting off their supply line at the Divide serves Legion, as do we all.
translation: [军团] 杀死NCR，切断他们在大裂谷的补给线对军团有好处，对我们也一样。

original: {Echoing player's statement}Serves the Legion?
translation: {Echoing player's statement}为军团服务？

original: {Quiet, accusing}I carry no hatred for duty... if that's what this was. The Divide was more than that. Its people, more than that.
translation: {Quiet, accusing}我不憎恨责任...如果这就是的话。大裂谷不止于此，它的人民，不止于此。

original: [Legion] The dead? You mean your brothers in the Legion - our brothers.
translation: [军团] 死者？你是说你军团里的兄弟...我们的兄弟。

original: {Respectful for dead}The Legion who died here... they didn't deserve to die, like those that died in the fires of Boulder City... {sneering to self}bombs, Hanlon's gifts.
translation: {Respectful for dead}死在这里的军团...他们不应该死去，就像那些死在巨石城大火中的人一样...{sneering to self}炸弹，汉隆的礼物。

original: {Respectful}Their deaths were mercy compared to those who still walk. Any who die beneath the flag of the Bull... their death should be in battle.
translation: {Respectful}与那些仍在行走的人相比，他们的死亡是仁慈的。任何死在公牛旗帜下的人...他们应该死在战场上。

original: {Quiet}But no... the dead number more than my brothers.
translation: {Quiet}但是不...死者的数量比我的兄弟要多。

original: [NCR] The dead? You mean the Republic troops who were here?
translation: [NCR] 死者？你是说这里的共和国军队？

original: {Derisive}The soldiers of the Bear? They were dead already, their symbol... diseased. Deserved to die as my brothers did at Boulder City, mines, bombs.
translation: {Derisive}熊的士兵？他们已经死了，他们的象征...病态。就该像我的兄弟们在巨石城那样死去，地雷、炸弹。

original: {Sneers}I carry nothing for them. Their deaths here were a mercy - compared to the ones that still walk the Divide.
translation: {Sneers}我没有带给他们任何东西。他们死在这里是一种仁慈 - 与那些仍在大裂谷中行走的人相比。

original: [Legion] I'll see that you answer for it.
translation: [军团] 我会看到你的回答的。

original: {Disgust}Then Legion kills Legion. Farther you walk from the flag of the Bull, the more West creeps into you.
translation: {Disgust}然后军团杀死了军团。你离公牛的旗帜越远，西部就越深入你的心。

original: [Legion] I didn't side with the Legion until the Mojave.
translation: [军团] 直到莫哈维我才站在军团一边。

original: {DUPE}I know that now. Doesn't change what was done. The Legion who died here.
translation: {DUPE}我现在知道了。但这并不改变已经发生的事，这里死去的军团。

original: {Slight threat}Legion doesn't know your history. I do. They find out what happened here, how many of their own died... {"they'll want justice"}they'll want an answer.
translation: {Slight threat}军团不了解你的过往，我了解。他们发现了这里发生的事情，死了多少自己人...{"they'll want justice"}他们需要一个答案。

original: If you meant to kill me, you should have done it long ago.
translation: 如果你想杀我，早就该动手了。

original: I believed in what I followed then. Kill no Courier, Caesar's words. I honored them.
translation: 我相信我当时所遵循的。不要杀邮差，这是凯撒的话。我尊重这些。

original: Other Couriers could have been Legion - like me. Now, our allegiances are reversed.
translation: 其他的邮差可能是军团的人 - 比如我。现在，我们的立场颠倒了。

original: [Legion] Being Frumentarii kept you from killing me in the past. You have no such defense now.
translation: [军团]作为一个军团特务，你过去没有杀我。你现在没有这种防备了。

original: Not if you believe in what you follow. Kill no Courier, Caesar's words. I honored them.
translation: 只要你相信你所追随的就不会。不要杀邮差，这是凯撒的话。我尊重这些。

original: Other Couriers could have been Legion - like me. The truth is, you serve nothing, believe nothing. Killing you... meaningless.
translation: 其他的邮差可能是军团的人 - 比如我。但事实是，不为任何人服务，什么都不相信。杀了你...没有意义。

original: [Legion] You said you'd sworn not to kill me. If you're Legion, why are we at odds?
translation: [军团] 你说你曾发誓不会杀我。如果你是军团，为什么我们会有矛盾？

original: {Frowns, slight testing}You struck first. Not just at me... at the Legion. Or so I thought. Not sure of the history of it now.
translation: {Frowns, slight testing}你先出手的。不只是对我...对军团。或者是我这么认为的。现在还不确定这段历史。

original: Whatever flag you follow, or followed then... either way, you got too much of the Bear's sickness in you to live. Divide's proof of that.
translation: 无论你追随什么旗帜，或者当时追随的什么...不管哪种，你身上有太多熊的疾病，无法生存。大裂谷就是证明。

original: Want more than that, walk the road. Answers'll come, closer you get to home... you and that machine.
translation: 想要更多，那就上路吧。答案会来的，当你离家越近...你和那台机器。

original: [Legion] Legion doesn't kill Legion. Caesar's orders?
translation: [军团] 军团不杀军团，凯撒的命令？

original: {DUPE}{Smile/sneer}What kind of world would this be if Courier killed Courier.{No sound file}
translation: {DUPE}{Smile/sneer}如果邮差杀了邮差，这将是一个怎样的世界。{No sound file}

original: {DUPE}You've got enough distance ahead of you - save your breath for the road, don't waste it on words.
translation: {DUPE}你前面还有很长的路 - 把你的呼吸留给道路吧，不要浪费在言语上。

original: [Legion] Legion does not kill Legion - but you're not that anymore. I'm going to kill you.
translation: [军团] 军团不杀军团...但是你已经不属于他们了。我会干掉你的。

original: If that's all that drives you, it won't last. The Legion... it won't last either.
translation: 如果这就是你的全部动力，它不会持续太久。军团...也不会持久。

original: [Legion] So... when you called me traitor in Hopeville, that title belongs to you.
translation: [军团] 所以...当你在黎明镇叫我叛徒的时候，那个头衔是属于你的。

original: {Angry}No, it is a title {emph}you earned. Legion or not, you have betrayed more than you know.
translation: {angry}不，这是你赢得的{emph}头衔。不管你是不是军团，你的背叛比你自己想象的要多。

original: [Legion] Seeing this place. It meant more to you than the Legion?
translation: [军团] 看看这个地方，对你来说比军团更重要吗？

original: Yes. And it did to you once, I'm sure of it.
translation: 是的。对你来说曾经也是，我确信这一点。

original: [Legion] Are you angry that this explosion undermined the Legion's plans? It was an accident.
translation: [军团] 你因为这次爆炸破坏了军团的计划而生气吗？那是个意外。

original: {DUPE}{Anger}Accident? Ignorance is a {emph}choice. The Chip - a choice.
translation: {DUPE}{Anger}意外？无知是一种{emph}选择。芯片 - 也是一种。

original: {DUPE}{More to himself}As for anger... it is what I carry for the dead, and all that come here.
translation: {DUPE}{More to himself}至于愤怒...这是我为死者和所有来到这里的人所背负的。

original: [Legion] If I destroyed the NCR in this place, why do you care?
translation: [军团] 如果我在这个地方摧毁了NCR，你还在乎什么？

original: {Emph}Legion died here as well. {Beat, but...}What you did... that's not {emph}all that cuts at me.
translation: {Emph}军团也死在这。{Beat, but...}你所做的...并不是{emph}我身上所有的伤口。

original: Left Leg
translation: 左腿

original: Right Leg
translation: 右腿

original: Torso
translation: 躯干

original: Right Arm
translation: 右臂

original: Left Arm
translation: 左臂

original: Head
translation: 头

original: You've acquired the Big Mountain Transportalponder! It's capable of transporting you between the Mojave Wasteland and Big MT.\n\nTo return to the Mojave (or go back to Big MT from the Mojave), simply equip the Transportalponder! as you would any weapon, pull the trigger, and away you'll go. Note that it won't work in interiors or in combat situations, and is totally incapable of harming your enemies.
translation: 你获得了大山脉的传送装置！它能让你在大山脉和莫哈维废土之间传送。只能传送你一个人。\n\n想要回到莫哈维（或者从莫哈维回到大山脉），只需像装备武器一样装备传送装置，然后扣动扳机，接着就上路了！注意，在室内或者战斗中，你无法使用它进行传送，而且它也没有任何攻击力。

original: This mysterious data card seems to contain some sort of computer code. However, it is of no significance to you at this time.
translation: 这个神秘的数据卡似乎包含某种计算机代码。然而，在这个时候，这对你来说毫无意义。

original: Leave it Alone
translation: 不去动它

original: You do not have enough Sierra Madre Chips.
translation: 你没有足够的马德雷山脉筹码。

original:
This is an administrative override code for the Sierra Madre Vending Machines. It must have been recovered from the Sierra Madre or created by reverse engineering Old World technology.

The code allows you to unlock any vending machine codes that were not discovered during your visit to the Sierra Madre. It also grants access to some special codes that were previously not available.

Who says that you have to let go?

Chips required to activate: %.0f
translation:
这是马德雷山脉自动贩卖机的管理代码。它一定是从马德雷山脉找到或者是通过对旧世界技术的逆向工程创造出来的。

这个代码可以让你解锁任何你在马德雷山脉旅行中没有发现的自动贩卖机，它还允许访问一些以前不可用的特殊代码。

谁说你必须放手？

激活所需的筹码：%.0f

original: Vending Machine Admin Override Code
translation: 自动售货机管理员覆盖代码

original: Pick Up and Activate
translation: 拾取并激活

original: Leave
translation: 离开

original: Destory
translation: 毁坏

original: Throwing Knife Spear
translation: 餐刀投矛

original: Dean's Tuxedo
translation: 迪安的燕尾服

original: Vera's Outfit
translation: 薇拉的服装

original: Assassin Suit
translation: 刺客套装

original: Dead Money Jumpsuit
translation: 死钱连身衣

original: [Return] Hat, Baseball Cap
translation: [回收] 帽子，棒球帽

original: [Return] Hat, Bonnet
translation: [回收] 帽子，软帽

original: Police Pistol
translation: 警用手枪

original: Cosmic Knife
translation: 大宇宙餐刀

original: Automatic Rifle
translation: 自动步枪

original: Sierra Madre Armor
translation: 马德雷山脉安保护甲

original: Sierra Madre Helmet
translation: 马德雷山脉安保头盔

original: Sierra Madre Armor, Reinforced
translation: 马德雷山脉安保护甲, 加固版

original: Sierra Madre Helmet, Reinforced
translation: 马德雷山脉安保头盔, 加固版

original: [Return] Lingerie
translation: [回收] 女士内衣

original: [Return] Businesswear (Soiled)
translation: [回收] 商务套装(脏污)

original: Tales of a Junktown Jerky Vendor
translation: 垃圾镇肉干小贩传奇

original: [Return] Businesswear (Stained)
translation: [回收] 商务套装(污损)

original: Holorifle
translation: 全息步枪

original: Nikola Tesla and You
translation: 尼古拉·特斯拉与你

original: Duck and Cover!
translation: 卧倒与掩蔽！

original: Guns and Bullets
translation: 枪与子弹

original: Tumblers Today
translation: 今日锁具

original: D.C. Journal of Internal Medicine
translation: 特区内科杂志

original: Grognak the Barbarian
translation: 野蛮人歌南

original: Dean's Electronics
translation: 迪安的电子学

original: Big Book of Science
translation: 科学大百科

original: Chinese Army: Spec. Ops. Training Manual
translation: 中国军队：特种作战训练手册

original: Lying, Congressional Style
translation: 国会教你撒谎

original: Wasteland Survival Guide
translation: 废土生存指南

original: Pugilism Illustrated
translation: 拳击画报

original: Bear Trap Fist
translation: 捕熊夹拳套
